description.ko: 유기적 생명과 기술의 섬세한 교차점을 보여주며, 프랙탈 꽃과 빛을 통해 자연이 디지털 회로를 되찾는 모습을 표현합니다.
description.en: A delicate intersection of organic life and technology, showing nature reclaiming digital circuits through fractal flowers and light.

prompt: An intricate digital orchid blooming from a circuit-etched obsidian plate, its petals composed of shifting #89CFF0 iridescent fractal code and translucent glass veins pulsing with #FFB6C1 light. Nature is reclaiming technology through #50C878 mossy circuitry and #4A0E4E binary-coded pollen particles floating in a soft bokeh background. 8k resolution, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage and cinematic lighting emphasize the eternal spring of a digital garden where organic and silicon life merge.
